actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change certain requirements relating to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase certain income-related requirements with respect to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.

titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change certain requirements relating to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.
